select memberid, idx, pwd, name, email, phone, addr1, addr2, post, birth, gender, regdate, lastdate, pwdate, status, imgfilename, filesize, func_age(birth) as ages from member where memberid = #{memberid}

select * from book where ${CATEGORY} like '%' || #{SEARCHWORD} || '%' and status in(0, 2)
and libcode_fk = #{LIBCODE}

select count(*) from ( select bookid_fk, memberid_fk from rental R join book B on R.bookid_fk = B.bookid where status = 1 UNION select bookid_fk, memberid_fk from reservation ) where memberid_fk = #{memberid}
mapper.insert: insert into rental(idx, bookid_fk, memberid_fk, rentaldate, deadline, renew) values(rent_seq.nextval, #{BOOKID}, #{MEMBERID}, sysdate, #{DEADLINE}, default)
mapper.select: select count(*) from rental where trunc(deadline) < sysdate and memberid_fk = #{memberid}
mapper.update: update member set latefee = latefee + (100 * #{DEADLINECUT}), revokedate = revokedate + #{DEADLINECUT}, status = 2 where memberid = #{MEMBERID}
update book set status = 0 where bookid = #{bookid}
update book set status = 2 where bookid = #{bookid}
mapper.insert: insert into returned(idx, memberid_fk, bookid_fk, returndate, rentaldate, deadline) values(returned_seq.nextval, #{MEMBERID}, #{BOOKID}, sysdate, (select rentaldate from rental where bookid_fk = #{BOOKID}), (select deadline from rental where bookid_fk = #{BOOKID}))
mapper.select: select title from reservation R join book B on R.bookid_fk = B.bookid where B.bookid = #{bookid}
mapper.update: update rental set deadline = deadline + 7, renew = renew + 1 where bookid_fk = #{bookid}
mapper.insert: insert into reservation(idx, bookid_fk, memberid_fk, reservedate) values(reserve_seq.nextval, #{BOOKID}, #{MEMBERID}, to_date(#{RESERVEDATE}))
mapper.select: select * from ( select gcode, to_number(to_char(rentaldate, 'mm')) as rentalmonth , count(*) as cnt , round(count(*)/(select count(*) from returned where rentaldate >= func_startyearcal(#{CURRENTYEAR}) and rentaldate < func_startyearcal(to_number(#{CURRENTYEAR})-1) and to_number(to_char(rentaldate, 'mm')) = #{RENTALMONTH} )*100, 1) as percent from returned R join book B on R.bookid_fk = B.bookid join genre G on B.gcode_fk = G.gcode where R.rentaldate >= func_startyearcal(0) and R.rentaldate < func_startyearcal(to_number(#{CURRENTYEAR})-1) group by grouping sets( (G.gcode, to_char(rentaldate, 'mm')) ) order by rentalmonth, gcode ) V where rentalmonth = #{RENTALMONTH}
